This is difficult since the tv is wall mounted--- what a pain
author: dawn mcfadden

review: We purchased a Roku 3 for another room at the same time we purchased the fire stick. The Roku seems to get a better signal from our wifi (and its farther away from our router) than the fire stick. We have experienced more periods of buffering and a couple complete losses of connection with the fire stick where we have not with the Roku. We have the fastest internet available with our service provider and like I said, the Roku seems to get a better signal so there does not seem to be an issue with the wifi service itself. Relatively speaking however when loading apps and shows it is pretty fast. I would however recommend it for the price and will probably just move it to a bedroom that does not get as much viewing time and replace with another Roku (or try out the fire TV) in the room it is in.
author: Andrea Matthews

review: When it works it's wonderful. That being said it loses its wifi connection multiple times a day for no known reason. We, like most families, have multiple devices running on wireless at any one time and the Fire Stick is the only one with this issue.
